Trinity::

She pawed at the glass and growled in her kitten growl. "Aww, come on 
guys. Let me out."   She walked back and forth inside the pod.  She 
put her nose to the bottom of the pod and looked around.  She was 
small, and there was a lot of room in the pod.  She was a child as 
were the pod was made for a large adult.  She growled and prowled 
around in side.  She felt trapped. She didn't know what was going on. 
She sat down on her hind legs and lowered her head.  She thought 
about how she ended up in this mess.

She was on the ship with her parents and other relitives.  She was 
made on that ship by her parents.  That star ship was the only home 
she had ever known.  The ship was flying through space, on a 
scientific exploration mission.  It had entered into the solor system 
and started exploring the different planets.    It was passing the 
planet of Jupitor when it was hit my a large meteor and it's engines 
were heavily damaged,  the captain saw on the scanners that earth, 
despite it's distance away from the ship, would prove to be the 
better planet to land on and make repairs to the ship.  The ship made 
it'a way through space.  It was nearing earth when it passed through 
the meteor belt outside the planet.  It was bombarded and pummeled 
with spase rocks and meteors from the size of a marble to the size of 
a sky scraper.  The ship took a huge beating. Then the ship, as it 
lost power and sustained great damage, was pulled towards the earth 
by it's gravitaional pull.  Trinity saw her mother grab her and stick 
her into the pod as the ship heased towards the ground.  her mother 
kissed her on the nose and then closed the lid on the pod.  Her 
mother turned on the stasis lock command on the pod, putting Trinity 
into stasis.  Then her mother launched the pod moments before impact. 

Trinity sighed and then looked up at the sky, through the glass top 
of the pod. She whispered, "I'm sorry mom."
